title: Emergent canonical spin tensor in the chiral symmetric hot QCD
authors:
M. Buzzegoli (Iowa State University and West University of Timisoara)
  and A. Palermo (Stony Brook)
authorsParsed: Iowa State University and West University of Timisoara
abstract:
The spin tensor is fundamental to relativistic spin hydrodynamics, but its
definition is ambiguous due to the pseudogauge symmetry. We show that this
ambiguity can be solved in interacting field theories. We prove that the mean
field limit of the Nambu-Jona-Lasinio model with spin-spin interactions is
equivalent to non-dissipative spin hydrodynamics with a canonical spin tensor.
